```{r,echo=FALSE}
options(warn= -1)
library(knitr) 
```


```{r,echo=FALSE}
options(warn= -1)
url <- "http://bjcochrane.github.io/Maps/Rendered/"
Trips <-list.files(path="./Rendered", pattern=".html")
Trips <-Trips[which(Trips!="index.html")]
```

```{r,echo=FALSE}
Trips.url <-paste0(url,Trips,"\n")
#Trips.url
out <-data.frame(Trip=(paste0("[",Trips,"](",Trips.url,")")))
kable(out)
```
